column2: Kuya: That was close. You okay over there, Kai?
column3: Master Kai: Yeah I'm just about wrapped up. Give me a few minutes.

column2: Avatar Yangchen: You must tread carefully from here on out, young Avatar. The spirits are getting more agitated by the day.
column3: Kuya: How much time do I have?

column2: Avatar Yangchen: I'm not sure. You must hurry.
column3: Kuya: Why don't we reconnect you back to the Avatar Spirit first?
